dmca.title: Great Wall of Copyright (#4)
dmca.body:
Dec. 28th, 2002


Xi'an International Studies University
Xi'an, Shannxi, 710061
People's Republic of China

Hereunder, I, on behalf of Travelchinaguide.com, the property of Xi'an Diamond Network Co, Ltd,. would like to notify you a [sic] copyright Infringement with part of our website content.
              
The copyrighted work at issue is [sic] the texts that appear on:
    
              http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/sichuan/chengdu/wuhou_temple.htm
    
http:/www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/lhasa/yabajing.htm
    
              http://www.travelchinaguide.com/attraction/tibet/shigatse/shigatse/salu_monastery.htm

Search queries and related infringing web pages that appear on the Google search result pages are listed below,

Search Query: Wuhou Temple

Infringing Web Pages: www.heatour.com/english/wuhou.htm

Search Query: Yangbajin

Infringing Web Pages: www.heatour.com/english/yangbachen.htm
 
Search Query: shalu monastery

Infringing Web Pages: www.heatour.com/english/salu.htm

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner,Travelchinaguide.com, its agent, or the law.

We ran be reached at [private] or [private]

The plagiary [sic] can be reached at [private].

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
    
              Sincerely yours,
    
               [private]
    
              General Manager
              Travelchinaguide.com
              Xi'an Diamond Network Co, Ltd.
